lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump quoted from Scripture in a speech on Friday, but has been ill at ease discussing issues critical for Christian conservatives.

byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and ALEXANDER BURNS

headline.print_headline: Abortion and Israel Are Absent From Trump’s Appeal to Evangelical Voters
headline.main: Abortion and Gay Marriage Are Absent from Donald Trump’s Appeal to Evangelicals

snippet: Mr. Trump quoted from Scripture in a speech on Friday, but has been ill at ease discussing issues critical for Christian conservatives....
abstract: Donald Trump fails to mention abortion, same-sex marriage or Israel during address at Value Voters Summit in Washington, all issues of significant importance to evangelicals who attend event; address is somewhat unusual in that Trump is appealing to some of most loyal party activists for their support mere two months before election, at time when candidates typically try to persuade undecided voters.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
